description: Service layer class managing Product entities, providing CRUD operations with transaction management.

classes.name: ProductService
classes.description: Service class for handling product business logic, including CRUD operations with transactional support.

methods.name: findAll
methods.description: Returns a list of all products.

methods.name: findById
methods.description: Retrieves a product by its ID, throws NotFoundException if not found.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new product; ID is generated.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing product identified by ID with new details.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a product by ID, throws NotFoundException if not found.
